title: Bano Qabil 5.0 Overview & Eligibility
text: Launched January 3, 2026, Bano Qabil 5.0 is Pakistan's largest FREE IT training initiative by Alkhidmat Foundation. It provides 100% free advanced IT & tech courses with mandatory AI integration. Open to both males and females aged 14–30 years.

title: Software Development & Programming Faculty – Top Instructors
text: Head: Muzammil Bilwani (Senior Engineer @ Careem, 10+ yrs). Other key names: Abdul Basit Arif (Full Stack & Startup Mentor), Basit Hussain (MERN/Next.js), Alqama bin Shuja (Scalable Web Apps), Ali Haider (Full Stack Educator), Shahbaz Ahmed (MERN Projects), Abdul Wasay (PHP/Laravel), Waqar Rana (Full Stack & Mentoring).

title: Mobile App Development Faculty
text: Muhammad Arsalan Sohail – Senior Mobile Instructor, 6+ years experience, Senior Software Engineer @ Eplanet Global. Expertise: React Native, iOS/Android, Cross-platform development. Rating: 4.8

title: AI, Data Science & Machine Learning Faculty
text: Key instructors: Ahmed Sarim (AI Engineer), Fahad bin Ashfaq (AI/Python/Java/Flutter), Hasnain Ahmed (GenAI & AI Agents), Abdur Rehman Khan (Data Science & Python), Amjad Aziz (Data Analytics & Networks), Muhammad Muaaz (Excel/SQL/Power BI).

title: Cybersecurity Faculty
text: Nadeem Ahmed (25+ years B2B Cybersecurity Executive), Syed Mustafa Raza (BS CyberSecurity, Certified Pentester, CEH, Vulnerability Assessment & Python for Security). Rating: 4.8–4.9

title: UI/UX & Graphic Design Faculty – Top Names
text: Shahzaib Arshed (Google Certified UX Designer), Saqib Hussain (UI/UX Developer), Salman Saeed (24+ yrs Multimedia), Talha Hassan (Creative Director & Professor), Syed Ayyaz Mustafa (22 yrs Graphic Design), Rasheed Ahmed Khan (20+ yrs Advertising), Munawar Hassan (Motion Graphics).

title: Digital Marketing & Social Media Faculty – Highlights
text: Standout names: Hoorain Salman (2x Award-Winning, 30+ brands scaled), Mahera Talib (International Strategy), Erum Ghulam Hussain (SEO Specialist), Haris Mumtaz (Social Media & Media Production), Syeda Fiza Sajid (Content & Strategy), Saif Ahmed (Full Stack Digital Marketing), Saim Fateh Malik (Creative & Emotional Branding).

title: E-commerce & Amazon Faculty
text: Abdul Hai Bhatti (Amazon Seller, PPC & Brand Building Expert), Saad Azhar (Amazon Specialist since 2020), Sheikh Subhan Ahmed (E-commerce & Digital Growth), Syed Muhammad Misbah ul Haque (E-commerce Frontend Development).

title: Full Karachi Campuses List (30+ Locations)
text: Major campuses include: AI Huda (North Karachi), Anjuman Complex (Sakhi Hasan), Gulshan-e-Iqbal (multiple), Clifton, Landhi #6, Liaquatabad, Bahadurabad, Garden, Orangi Town 11½, Korangi, Malir (Kausar Town), Lyari (HOL Kara Bai), Shah Faisal, Jauhar, Maymar, SITE (Metroville), Keamari, Nazimabad, Baldia, and many more across the city.

title: Recent News & Major Achievements 2025
text: Key updates: Best IT Education Award 2025, Bano Qabil 3.0 Graduation Ceremony (June 2025), MoU with Fossphorus for Satellite Incubation Center (May 2025), Strategic MoU with CEGA for Gaming & Animation (Dec 2025), Nexus Summit 2025 Certificate Distribution (Oct 2025).

title: Current Job & Career Opportunities at Bano Qabil
text: Open roles include: Senior Web Development Instructor, UI/UX Design Instructor (part-time), Admissions Counselor, IT Support Specialist, Technical Content Writer (contract/remote), Campus Coordinator (various cities). Competitive packages, health insurance, training, flexible hours.

title: MERN Stack & Web Development Instructors
text: Top MERN/Web faculty: Adil Ahmed Shekani (MERN Lead), Basit Hussain (MERN/Next.js/UI-UX), Mirza Sarim Baig (Certified MERN), Shahbaz Ahmed (MERN Projects), Abdul Basit Arif (Full Stack JS), Alqama bin Shuja (Scalable Web), Shaukat Sohail (Python/JS Full Stack).

title: CIT, Python & Programming Fundamentals Faculty
text: Instructors focused on basics: Abdul Munim Usmani (CIT & Programming), Ahmed Sarim (Python for AI), Abdur Rehman Khan (Python & Data), Ismail Ghazi (CIT/Python/Marketing), Syed Ibad Ali (Software Engineering Basics), Muhammad Owais (CS Fundamentals).

title: Performance Marketing & Ads Faculty
text: Specialists: Hoorain Salman (Performance & Brand Scaling), Layeba Ahsan (Meta/Google/YouTube Ads Expert), Bisma Qureshi (Meta Ads & WordPress), Muhammed Anas Arain (Business Growth & WordPress).

title: Animation, Motion Graphics & Multimedia Faculty
text: Key names: Salman Saeed (24+ yrs Multimedia/Video/Animation), Muhammad Abdullah Waqar (Experience Design & Animation), Muhammad Shahzad Shaikh (3D & Video Editing), Munawar Hassan (Motion Design), Sheheryar Khan (Multimedia & Animation).

title: Faculty Rating Leaders (4.8+)
text: Top-rated: Muzammil Bilwani (4.9), Nadeem Ahmed (4.9), Salman Saeed (4.9), Talha Hassan (4.9), Muhammad Arif (4.9), Basit Hussain (4.8), Abdul Basit Arif (4.8), Shahzaib Arshed (4.8), Syed Mustafa Raza (4.8), Haris Mumtaz (4.8), Hoorain Salman (4.8), Mahera Talib (4.8).

title: Women in Tech & Design Faculty
text: Prominent female faculty: Syeda Fiza Sajid (Digital Marketing & Content), Hoorain Salman (Performance Marketing), Ayesha Kamran (Social Media Manager), Bisma Qureshi (Digital & Backend), Mahera Talib (Strategy & Leadership), Aamrah Sami Khan (Content Writing).

title: Startup, Entrepreneurship & Mentoring Faculty
text: Mentors with startup focus: Abdul Basit Arif (Startup Founder & Mentor), Talha Hassan (Entrepreneur & Professor with Fortune 500 experience), Muzammil Bilwani (Team Leadership & Mentoring 500+ developers).

title: Bano Qabil – Core Mission & Impact
text: Bano Qabil, by Alkhidmat Foundation, is Pakistan’s largest free IT & skills training program empowering youth (14–30) with job-ready tech skills, especially in AI, software, marketing, design, and e-commerce. Thousands trained, many now working in industry or freelancing.

title: How to Join Bano Qabil Courses
text: Admissions usually open via official website or Alkhidmat channels. Bano Qabil 5.0 launched Jan 2026 – completely free, age 14–30, both genders eligible. Check eligibility, apply online, attend orientation/test/interview if required. Multiple campuses in Karachi.
